T02D2636:202a-44: bam h'um tram brum ram phat ham srum /
T02D2636:202a-45: du ru aa gam / h'um tram hri aa /
T02D2636:202a-46: h'um h'um tram hri hri aa aa /
T02D2636:202a-47: ai aa pa ra pa yam /
T02D2636:202a-50: thugs kyi ye shes 'bar ba las //
T02D2636:202a-51: sku yi phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2636:202a-52: 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
T02D2636:202a-53: aom brid ta brid ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2636:202a-54: padma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
T02D2636:202b-0: aom tra tha tra tha sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um @202b phat ;
T02D2636:202b-1: rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas //
T02D2636:202b-2: aom tsitshanda tsitshanda sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2636:202b-3: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D2636:202b-4: sngags 'dis lha rnams kun dbang bskur //
T02D2636:202b-5: aom h'um aom aom aom tr'am aom hr'i:/
T02D2636:202b-7: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya //
T02D2636:202b-8: mdzub mo lcags kyu bsnol nas ni //
T02D2636:202b-9: rdo rje se gol bkrol bar bya //
T02D2636:202b-10: aom badzra s'a dhu pa ri pu ru badzra sa ma ya dza:/

T02D2636:202b-12: dbyangs kyis spyan yang drang bar bya //

T02D2636:202b-17: dam tshig phyag rgyas 'byung rgyu bya //
T02D2636:202b-18: g-yas pas mchog sbyin par byas la //
T02D2636:202b-19: g-yon pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni //

T02D2636:202b-21: rdo rje bcings la gung gnyis mnyam //
T02D2636:202b-22: mthe bong mthe chung brkyang ba phyag / rdo rje bcings pa gung gnyis mnyam //
T02D2636:202b-23: tshigs bcag sor mo gzhan yang 'khor //
T02D2636:202b-24: de nyid mthe bong mthe chung bkug / rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2636:202b-26: gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2636:202b-27: de nyid spyi bor bskor ba yi //
T02D2636:202b-28: gdugs dkar po yi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2636:202b-29: khu tshur mdzub gnyis mthe'u chung bsnol //
T02D2636:202b-30: mdun nas gyen bskor 'khor los sgyur //
T02D2636:202b-31: gung bsgreng mdzub mo rtse sbyar bkug / lhag ma 'od 'phro gtsug tor rgyal //
T02D2636:202b-32: de bzhin mdzub gnyis rdo rjer byas //
T02D2636:202b-33: lhag ma bsdams pa rnam rgyal rgya //
T02D2636:202b-34: bsdams pa mdun bzhag bdug pa ma //
T02D2636:202b-35: de nyid gyen gtong phreng ba ma //
T02D2636:202b-36: mthe bong bsgreng bskor mar me ma //
T02D2636:202b-37: de nyid byug pa ltar byas dri //
T02D2636:202b-38: mdzub mo gyis bkug lcags kyu'o //
T02D2636:202b-39: rtse mo gnyis sprad zhags pa la //
T02D2636:202b-40: gcig la gcig mdud lcags sgrog go //
T02D2636:202b-41: de nyid las sbyin dril bu gnyis //
T02D2636:202b-42: dpral bar thal sbyar de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2636:202b-43: mgrin par padma gsung gi phyag / thugs ka'i thal
T02D2636:202b-44: mo rdo rje phyag / rigs rnams spyir yang phyag
T02D2636:202b-45: bya'o // 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas dang //
T02D2636:202b-46: phyi nang rab tu gsang ba dang //
T02D2636:202b-47: bsod nams dge dang dag pa'i don //
T02D2636:202b-48: bde bar tshim par bya ba dang //
T02D2636:202b-49: spyi dang so so'i mdor bsdus mchod //
T02D2636:202b-50: dgyes pa bskyed de lha rnams la //
T02D2636:203a-1: phyag sku la so sor bstod //
T02D2636:203a-2: chos kyi phyag rgya las byung ba //
T02D2636:203a-3: ngan song sbyong ba'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D2636:203a-4: spyi'i dang so so gang byed bzlas //
T02D2636:203a-5: las kyi phyag rgya las la gzhug / dngos grub thams cad gsol bar bya //
T02D2636:203a-6: yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab //
T02D2636:203a-7: de nas dri zhim dri ma sogs //
T02D2636:203a-8: rang gi lus ni bsrungs nas kyang //
T02D2636:203a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pas zhugs nas ni //
T02D2636:203a-10: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02D2636:203a-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku //
T02D2636:203a-12: slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2636:203a-13: bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog / snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni //
T02D2636:203a-15: slob mas rgyun bshags bdun pa bya //
T02D2636:203a-16: bla mas de la lan byin pa //
T02D2636:203a-17: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2636:203a-18: gsang ba chen po rigs dag la //
T02D2636:203a-19: gsang ba chen po 'dzin pa ni //
T02D2636:203a-20: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02D2636:203a-21: slob mas 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02D2636:203a-22: slob mas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
T02D2636:203a-23: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02D2636:203a-24: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D2636:203a-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni //
T02D2636:203a-26: slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la //
T02D2636:203a-27: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i //
T02D2636:203a-28: mi ldog 'khor lo sbyor bar ldan //
T02D2636:203a-29: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog / gsang ba chen por zhugs nas kyang //
T02D2636:203a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur te //
T02D2636:203a-31: skal ldan chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2636:203a-32: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab pa'i //
T02D2636:203a-33: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan//
T02D2636:203a-34: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba'i //
T02D2636:203a-35: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2636:203a-36: bla mas de la dam tshig stsal //
T02D2636:203a-37: dpal ldan ngan song sbyong ba yi //
T02D2636:203a-38: rgyud bzhin gsungs pa'i dam tshig rnams //
T02D2636:203a-39: 'di nas bzung nas byang chub tu /
T02D2636:203a-40: khyod kyis yang dag bsrung bar bya //
T02D2636:203a-41: des kyang ji ltar gnas pa yi ;
T02D2636:203a-42: / sdom pa bdag gis bsrung zhes brjod //
T02D2636:203a-43: bla mas lha la gsol ba gdab //
T02D2636:203a-44: che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di //
T02D2636:203a-45: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //
T02D2636:203a-46: dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi //
T02D2636:203a-48: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta yo ga bo dhi
T02D2636:203b-0: tsitta autp'a da y'a @203b mi su ra ta sa
T02D2636:203b-1: ma ya stvam / badzra pra tha ya tha su kham /
T02D2636:203b-2: de nas lhar ni bskyed byas la //
T02D2636:203b-3: mchod pa rnams kyis mchod byas te //
T02D2636:203b-4: stod g-yogs dar gyis gdong g-yogs nas //
T02D2636:203b-5: bgegs bskrad bdug pa bya ba ni //
T02D2636:203b-7: las kyi bum pa chus gang bas //
T02D2636:203b-8: bkrus te dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D2636:203b-9: de nas lag pa nas bzung ste //
T02D2636:203b-10: sgo bzhi dag nas 'jug par bya //
T02D2636:203b-11: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs bzhugs //
T02D2636:203b-12: ngas ni khyod la ye shes snang //
T02D2636:203b-13: de bzhin dngos grub grub byed de //
T02D2636:203b-14: de lta bu ni khyod sbyin zhugs //
T02D2636:203b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2636:203b-16: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02D2636:203b-17: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2636:203b-18: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2636:203b-19: aom badzra au da ka tha /
T02D2636:203b-20: deng khyod lha ni nga yin te //
T02D2636:203b-21: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02D2636:203b-22: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D2636:203b-23: nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / slob dpon la ni brnyas pa na //
T02D2636:203b-24: bde ba spangs nas dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2636:203b-25: aom di na te na ra ka na /
T02D2636:203b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2636:203b-27: byin gyis brlabs pa rgya chen nyid //
T02D2636:203b-28: bdag la rab tu zhu bas na //
T02D2636:203b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la phob //
T02D2636:203b-30: slob ma de zhus bla ma 'di //
T02D2636:203b-31: rdo rje dri bsgos snying gar gzhag //
T02D2636:203b-32: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02D2636:203b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2636:203b-34: ye shes rdo rje bla med 'dir //
T02D2636:203b-35: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / aom badzra a'a be sha ya aa aa /
T02D2636:203b-36: rdo rje 'chang gi snying gar dbab //
T02D2636:203b-37: 'bab par byed de ma byung sbyang //
T02D2636:203b-38: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya //
T02D2636:203b-39: legs par dor cig sems dpa' che //
T02D2636:203b-40: thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2636:203b-41: me tog gang la lhung ba de //
T02D2636:203b-42: de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha //
T02D2636:203b-43: aom sarba bit pra titstsha ho //
T02D2636:203b-44: aom pra ti grihna sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02D2636:203b-45: de yi phreng ba mgo la bcing //
T02D2636:203b-46: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2636:203b-47: mig 'byed pa la brtson par mdzad //
T02D2636:203b-48: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02D2636:203b-49: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D2636:203b-50: de ring nyid du 'byed par shog / he badzra p'a shya phat /
T02D2636:203b-51: rdo rjes gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya //
T02D2636:203b-52: de nas sgo ba nas brtsams te //
T02D2636:204a-2: dbab par bya ba gang yin pa //
T02D2636:204a-3: de ni nye bar bsdu bar byas //
T02D2636:204a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor shar ngos su //
T02D2636:204a-6: yi dam lha bsam dbang bskur bya //

T02D2636:204a-8: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar ;
T02D2636:204a-9: / lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D2636:204a-10: de bzhin bdag gis bum dbang bskur //
T02D2636:204a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D2636:204a-12: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
T02D2636:204a-13: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //
T02D2636:204a-14: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
T02D2636:204a-15: rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol//
T02D2636:204a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra aa bhi shinytsa m'am /

T02D2636:204a-18: dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskur bas //

T02D2636:204a-21: phal pa'i sa ni gzhom pa dang //

T02D2636:204a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mu ku ta ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2636:204a-26: dpal ldan rin chen cod pan dbang //
T02D2636:204a-27: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //
T02D2636:204a-28: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D2636:204a-29: rdo rje rin chen mdzad du gsol //
T02D2636:204a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ratna sva bh'a wa aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2636:204a-31: nga rgyal khams rnams dag byed pa'i //
T02D2636:204a-32: cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur bas //
T02D2636:204a-33: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi //
T02D2636:204a-34: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dbang thob shog / ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2636:204a-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2636:204a-36: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2636:204a-37: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2636:204a-38: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2636:204a-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa mi badzra sva bha wa stvam /
T02D2636:204a-40: chos kyi gsung rab dpal dang ldan //
T02D2636:204a-41: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //
T02D2636:204a-42: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D2636:204a-43: rdo rjes gsung du dbang bskur ro //

T02D2636:204a-46: rdo rje yis ni dbang bskur bas //
T02D2636:204a-47: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi //
T02D2636:204a-48: 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob shog / badzra aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2636:204b-0: 'di de sangs rgyas thams @204b cad kyi //
T02D2636:204b-1: shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D2636:204b-2: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //

T02D2636:204b-6: dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang //
T02D2636:204b-7: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas //

T02D2636:204b-9: rdo rje lus ni mdzad du gsol //

T02D2636:204b-21: dpal ldan ming gi dbang bskur ba //
T02D2636:204b-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi //

T02D2636:204b-26: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //

T02D2636:204b-28: wa sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa ga ta ya

T02D2636:204b-33: skyobs pa'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro //

T02D2636:204b-35: slob dpon dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
T02D2636:204b-36: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //

T02D2636:204b-40: de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur bas //
T02D2636:204b-41: 'gro ba bskyed pa'i gzi brjid can //
T02D2636:204b-42: ji ltar ye shes 'byung gnas gtso //
T02D2636:204b-43: slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i //
T02D2636:204b-44: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2636:204b-45: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2636:204b-46: bdag gi rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02D2636:204b-47: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //

T02D2636:205a-2: brdzun dang chang ni spang bar bya //
T02D2636:205a-3: mi dge ba ni bcu po dag / khyod kyis
T02D2636:205a-4: nam yang ma spyad cig / theg pa dman la
T02D2636:205a-5: mos pa dang // sems can 'khor ba ma spangs
T02D2636:205a-6: shig / mya ngan 'das la ma chags shig /
T02D2636:205a-7: lha dang mi la brnyas mi bya //

T02D2636:205a-9: 'gong par bya ba ma yin te //

T02D2636:205a-11: rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshed par byed //
T02D2636:205a-12: de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig / slob ma'i lus la lha bkod de //
T02D2636:205a-13: slob dpon byed pa'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D2636:205a-14: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa//

T02D2636:205a-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ro //

T02D2636:205a-19: ri ti ka aa bhi shikta sa ma ya ya
T02D2636:205a-20: shri ye h'um / ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2636:205a-21: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //

T02D2636:205a-27: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2636:205a-28: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //

T02D2636:205a-31: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
